title: illustrator CS and fontlab 5.0 settings
content:
Hi, I remember there used to be an archive of the old MSN FontLab group that had specific settings for illustrator and fontlab when importing files from illustrator.

I cannot find those old tips and I see that that forum is gone on MSN - though that was for an older version of fontlab. Are there similar settings for illustrator CS and fontlab 5.0?

If not, can anyone give me suggestions for H/W dimensions for inside illustrator for creating glyphs?

Any help or feedback appreciated
author: emel

comments.content:
Well, there’s a new forum:

[http://forum.fontlab.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043517/http:/forum.fontlab.com/ "http://forum.fontlab.com/")

Apparently, the posts from the old forum are there.

Another source: [_Learn Fontlab Fast_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043517/http:/www.logofontandlettering.com/) by Leslie Cabarga explains it in detail.
